coloredTexts.text: The Pickarang is a good tool to obtain items that are far from you.
A good blacksmith is made by his skill... And good tools.
I don't understand how a furnace can burn minerals.
It is said that in the Nether there is a huge and amazing forge.
How am I supposed to hold lava with a bucket?
What a great piece of work you have there. Did you craft it?
